name: n8n-nodes-vidopi
description: n8n custom nodes for Vidopi video processing API

scripts.build: tsc && find dist -name '*.js' -type f -exec sed -i '/Object.defineProperty(exports, "__esModule"/d' {} \; && cp logo.png dist/nodes/Vidopi/UploadVideo/ && cp logo.png dist/nodes/Vidopi/CutVideo/ && cp logo.png dist/nodes/Vidopi/MergeVideos/ && cp logo.png dist/nodes/Vidopi/ResizeVideo/ && cp logo.png dist/nodes/Vidopi/TaskStatus/
